attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 87 years old and suffer from Ostero-porosis and arthritis. The only medication which gives me, and many others relief from pain was Co-proxamol. Having been precribed various other painkillers none of them give adequate pain relief. I submit that the benefits of Co-proxamaol outway considerably it's supposed risks. Any painkiller taking in excess is potentially a risk .   I therefore submit  Co-proxanol to be  be re-instated and become again available  on prescription
